![](https://clouveo.com/templates/clouveo1/img/logo.png "")
Clouveo are experts in providing high quality, affordable hosting solutions, with our parent company WebSound operating in the UK since September 2013.

We understand that with cPanels recent price hike, cPanel powered hosting has become more and more expensive - Clouveo are back with our offers to maintain affordability, reliability and sustainability in line with cPanels price hike.
  
**Startup Web Hosting:**
5GB SSD Disk Space | Unmetered Bandwidth | 1 CPU Core | 1GB Memory
£7.16 / $9.20 Annually with Promo Code ST1XYMMXD8 - [ORDER HERE](https://clouveo.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&billingcycle=annually&promocode=ST1XYMMXD8 "ORDER HERE")
  
**Intermediate Web Hosting:**
15GB SSD Disk Space | Unmetered Bandwidth | 1 CPU Core | 1GB Memory
£11.96 / $16.00 Annually with Promo Code ST1XYMMXD8 - [ORDER HERE](https://clouveo.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2&billingcycle=annually&promocode=ST1XYMMXD8 "ORDER HERE")
 
**Ultimate Web Hosting:**
30GB SSD Disk Space | Unmetered Bandwidth | 1 CPU Core | 2GB Memory
£19.96 / $26.00 Annually with Promo Code ST1XYMMXD8 - [ORDER HERE](https://clouveo.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3&billingcycle=annually&promocode=ST1XYMMXD8 "ORDER HERE")
  
**Small Reseller Hosting:**
25GB SSD Disk Space | Unmetered Bandwidth | 25 cPanel Accounts
£4.54 / $5.95 Monthly with Promo Code 7WMT19CGYV - [ORDER HERE](https://clouveo.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=7&promocode=7WMT19CGYV "ORDER HERE")

Our UK based Web Hosting solutions are backed by cPanel Control Panel and pack a variety of features:
* 99.9% Uptime Guaranteed
* 14 Day Money Back Guarantee
* DDoS Protected
* Instant Activation
* cPanel/WHM Control Panel
* LiteSpeed/LSCache
* MariaDB Database Server
* Daily Backups
* Softaculous Software Installer
* Unmetered Domain Names, MySQL Databases, Email Accounts and FTP Accounts
* Resellers: Fully Whitelabel
* Resellers: Overselling Enabled
* Free Global Anycast DNS
* Shell/SSH Access
* Free Migrations
* Free LetsEncrypt SSLs
* London, United Kingdom Located

**FAQs**
  
_What are the full account resource limits?_
All resource limits by CloudLinux are displayed [here](https://clouveo.com/index.php/knowledgebase/26/Account-Resource-Limits.html "here")
 
_What PHP versions can I use?_
PHP 5.6 and PHP 7.x are all available.
  
_All prices exclude VAT which is charged to EU customers at the rate of their country of residence. UK customers and those outside of the EU aren't charged VAT._
  
[Feel free to browse our website here!](https://clouveo.com "Feel free to browse our website here!")
